sentences.english: This is the website for College of Agriculture, University of Saskatchewan .

sentences.english: Jia Sixie is well-known as a pioneer in farming.

sentences.english: The boy aims at becoming an agriculturist .
sentences.chinese: 男孩一心想成为农学家。

sentences.english: Won the Youth Science and Technology Prize of the eighth China Agricultural Society.
sentences.chinese: 获第八届中国农学会青年科技奖。

sentences.english: The agronomist suggested growing rice on the dried river bed.
sentences.chinese: 农学家建议在干涸的河床上种水稻。

sentences.english: Agronomists and farmers use the pictures to study crops.
sentences.chinese: 农学家和农民利用图片来研究庄稼。

sentences.english: They are improved strains bred by the Agricultural College.
sentences.chinese: 它们是农学院培育出的改良品种。

sentences.english: The state of Michigan already had an agricultural college .
sentences.chinese: 密西根州已有一所农学院。

sentences.english: Amorpha fruticosa L. is known for its abundant resources in nature and widely applied in medicine and agronomy.
sentences.chinese: 紫穗槐资源丰富，在医药及农学上应用广泛。

sentences.english: The findings have just appeared in Agronomy Journal.
sentences.chinese: 研究结果目前仅在农学周刊出现。

sentences.english: The performance of Saanen dairy goat has been analysed statistically.
sentences.chinese: 本文统计分析了西北农学院莎能羊群的产奶性能。

sentences.english: Appointed dean of Agricultural College, National Central University in 1942.

sentences.chinese: 然而巴西农学家和部长们还说它根本没有保护的价值。

sentences.chinese: 贾思勰被认为是农学的先驱者之一。
